title: How do ecosystem service functions affect ecological health? Evidence from the Yangtze Economic Belt in China
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00296B, Paper
wei wang, Jie Yu, Guishan Yang, chao wu, Jun Yang
Ecosystem services play an essential role as intermediaries linking natural ecosystem resources to socio-economic demands. Understanding their impact on ecological well-being is pivotal for ensuring regional environmental security and promoting...
